sentence: And I think I'll be interviewing Dave McCormick as well in the coming days.
author: Fox News Staff
title: 'The Ingraham Angle' on COVID restrictions and children

sentence: “It’s not often a U.S. senator from Texas comes to the Lehigh Valley,” Jonathan DelCollo of Reading said, referring to guest speaker Ted Cruz, who was there to support fellow Republican Dave McCormick’s bid for Pat Toomey’s soon-to-be-vacated Senate seat.
author: Andrew Scott
title: ‘The country looks to Pennsylvania’: Ted Cruz rallies in the Lehigh Valley to kick off candidate’s bid to replace Sen. Pat Toomey

sentence: Kathy Barnette, Jeff Bartos, Dave McCormick, Mehmet Oz, and Carla Sands will appear in the Pennsylvania Republican U.S. Senate debate on April 25 at 8 p.m. in a one-hour prime-time event airing in every market in the commonwealth.
author: George Stockburger
title: Pennsylvania Senate Race Debate: Republican candidates face-off
